attributes.action: Give all early years staff the same pay as teachers
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the hard work early years staff have done this year and reward that.
attributes.background: As nurseries and preschools have kept the country going through covid and allowed key workers to go to work they should be recognised for their work and given a pay rise so they earn the same as teachers.

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for the pay of staff employed at nurseries or preschools. This is a matter for individual nurseries and preschools.
